casebody.data:
IMC EXPLORATION COMPANY & The Petroleum Corp. of Delaware v. Foster HENDERSON, et al. No. 82-C-2588.

(SEE 82-C-2592).

Supreme Court of Louisiana. Nov. 29, 1982.

In re Kent Upson and Todd Upson, applying for certiorari, or writ of review, to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit. Parish of DeSoto. Eleventh Judicial District Court. Parish of DeSoto. 419 So.2d 490.

Denied.

WATSON, J., would grant the writ.
